title.b: Have fun with PIC microcontrollers, Jal v2 and Jallib

p.b: Step-by-step tutorials, covering the basic features of PIC microcontrollers, using jalv2 compiler and jallib libraries (version @VERSION@)

body.p: This is the on-line HTML version of "The Tutorial Book" PDF version. You can also download the PDF version from Jallib site, download section, which is where you'll also find the Jallib packages needed for these tutorials.
We hope you'll enjoy the journey and have some fun along the way!
